title: Create ad display website

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store advertisements with fields: id, title, description, imageUrl, targetUrl, and isActive status

quotes: Create a website for showing ads

acceptanceCriteria: Advertisement type is defined in Motoko with all required fields
Backend provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete advertisements
Only active advertisements are returned in public queries

requirements.text: Implement a homepage that displays all active advertisements in a grid layout

quotes: Create a website for showing ads

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage fetches and displays all active ads from the backend
Each ad shows its image, title, and description
Grid layout is responsive and works on mobile and desktop
Clicking an ad opens its target URL in a new tab

requirements.text: Create an admin interface to manage advertisements with forms to add, edit, and delete ads

quotes: Create a website for showing ads

acceptanceCriteria: Admin page includes a form to create new advertisements
Existing ads can be edited with pre-populated form fields
Ads can be deleted with confirmation
All operations reflect immediately in the ad list

requirements.text: Apply a modern, professional visual theme with clean typography, a cohesive color palette emphasizing trust and clarity, and consistent spacing that makes advertisements the focal point while maintaining a polished brand presence
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design is consistently applied across all pages
Color scheme avoids generic blue and purple unless contextually appropriate
Typography hierarchy clearly distinguishes headings, body text, and ad content
Layout guides user attention to advertisements without overwhelming the interface

constraints: Use React with TypeScript for frontend
Style with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn components
Authentication must use Internet Identity if needed
nonGoals: Real-time bidding or ad auction systems

required: Professional hero banner image for the homepage showing digital advertising concept with modern abstract design (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Placeholder advertisement image for demo purposes with generic product mockup (ad-placeholder.dim_600x400.png)
